mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY ( DIARY_USER, DIARY_NO, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT, DIARY_YN, ATT_YN, DIARY_DATE, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{diaryUser}, SEQ_DIARY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{diaryTitle}, #{diaryContent}, 'Y', #{attStatus}, #{diaryDate}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATT_NO, CONTENT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, MODIFIED_NAME, ATT_CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT_NO.NEXTVAL, ( SELECT CASE WHEN #{contentNo} = 0 THEN MAX(DIARY_NO) WHEN #{contentNo} > 0 THEN #{contentNo} ELSE MAX(DIARY_NO) END FROM DIARY ), #{originName}, #{modifiedName}, #{attCategoryNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(DNC.DIARY_NAME,'YOUR MY DIARY') AS "DIARY_NAME", DY.*, MODIFIED_NAME FROM DIARY_NAME_CATEGORY DNC FULL JOIN (SELECT DIARY_USER, DIARY_NO, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT, DIARY_DATE, ATT_YN FROM DIARY WHERE DIARY_YN = 'Y') DY ON (USER_NO = DIARY_USER) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON CONTENT_NO = DIARY_NO WHERE (DY.DIARY_USER = #{diaryUser} OR DNC.USER_NO = #{diaryUser})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY_NAME_CATEGORY ( USER_NO, DIARY_NAME ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{diaryName} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIARY_NAME_CATEGORY WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT DIARY_NO, NVL(ATT.ATT_NO , 0) AS "ATT_NO", DIARY_TITLE, MODIFIED_NAME, DIARY_CONTENT, ATT_YN, DIARY_DATE FROM DIARY D FULL JOIN ATTACHMENT ATT ON (D.DIARY_NO = ATT.CONTENT_NO) WHERE DIARY_USER = #{diaryUser} AND DIARY_TITLE = #{diaryTitle} AND DIARY_NO = #{diaryNo} AND DIARY_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_NO, USER_NO, SC_DATE, SC_TIME, SC_TITLE, SC_CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{scDate}, #{scTime}, #{scTitle}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_NO scheduleNo, SC_TITLE scTitle, SC_DATE scDate, SC_TIME scTime, SC_TITLE scTitle FROM SCHEDULE WHERE USER_NO = #{diaryUser}
mapper.update: UPDATE DIARY SET DIARY_YN = 'N' WHERE DIARY_USER = #{diaryUser} AND DIARY_NO = #{diaryNo} AND DIARY_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CONTENT_NO) FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE CONTENT_NO = #{contentNo}
